Tester

The tester class is the one responsible for initializing the testing cycle, its one of the entry points to working with the module.

class model.tester.Tester(respath: str, env_config: dict, agent_models: list, emb: str, app: str, alg: str, rwt: str, srp: tuple)

Initializes a tester object to tests an agent and calculate MRR & Hits@N metrics.

Parameters

  • respath – path to save the tests to.

  • env_config – the configuration file for this testing session.

  • agent_models – the list of agents to test. if length is 2 its assumed to be PPO algorithm or BASE if its length 1.

  • emb – the embedding to use for testing.

  • app – the action picking policy for the agent.

  • alg – the algorithm to use.

  • rwt – the reward type to use.

  • srp – the tuple containing the single relation pair info -> (is_single_rel:bool, relation_name:str)

The functions for the class are the following.

model.tester.Tester.run(self)

Executes the tests defined in the initialization and generates analytical metrcis from them.

Returns

hits_at -> the Hits@ metric calculated for the agent.

MRR -> the MRR metric calculated for the agent.

OR

False -> if the testing fails, the captured stack is printed and False is returned.

model.tester.Tester.generate_MRR_boxplot_and_source(self, MRR: list)

Saves the source data obtained from testing into a res.txt file

Parameters

MRR – the list of integers denoting the rank of the calculated paths.

model.tester.Tester.generate_found_paths_files(self, found_paths: list)

Writes all calculated paths into a paths.txt file

Parameters

found_paths – the list of paths found.

model.tester.Tester.path_contains_entity(self)

checks the list of visited entities and checks if the target has been visited.

Returns

True if target has been visited, False otherwise.

model.tester.Tester.set_gpu_config(self, use_gpu: bool)

if GPU is found and is usable by tensorflow, configures it.

Parameters

use_gpu – wether to use the GPU or not.

model.tester.Tester.update_gui_vars(self, tot_steps: Optional[int] = None, curr_step: Optional[int] = None, progtext: Optional[str] = None)

Auxiliary function to update the GUI parameters for progess updates.

Parameters

  • tot_steps – the total training step that are queued.

  • curr_step – the current training step.

  • progtext – the text to be displayed as progess info.

The tester also contains a GUI connector that handles GUI updates.

class model.tester.TesterGUIconnector(config: dict, tests: list)

Connects the GUI and the tester objects and initializes a new thread to keep track of the progress.

Parameters

  • config – a configuration dict.

  • test – the tests to perform.

Which contains the following methods.

model.tester.TesterGUIconnector.start_connection(self)

Stats the testing thread and updates the corresponding flag.

model.tester.TesterGUIconnector.update_current_tester(self, t: Tester)

Sets the active tester to the requested one

Parameters

t – the requested tester.

model.tester.TesterGUIconnector.update_info_variables(self)

updates the global variables with the current values from the class.

model.tester.TesterGUIconnector.threaded_update(self)

The testing thread main routine, it updates the info variables every second.

There are also some miscellaneous methods.

model.tester.compute_metrics(mrr: list, hits: dict, ep: int)

Given the raw saved test values, calculates the result metrics.

Parameters

  • mrr – the list of raw rank values adquired in testing.

  • param2 – the list of hits @ values adquired in testing.

Returns

hits, mrr -> the calculated metrics

model.tester.get_agents(agent_path: str, dataset: str, embeddings: list)

given the name of the agent and dataset to test, gets the models for that agent.

Parameters

  • agent_path – the path to the agents directory.

  • dataset – the name of the dataset

  • embeddings – the list of embeddings we are testing.

Returns

a list of agent models for the requested agents.

model.tester.extract_config_info(agent_path: str)

extract the required information for testing from the agents directory config_used.txt

Parameters

agent_path – the path to the agent directory

Returns

app -> action picking policy

alg -> algoritm name

rwt -> reward type

srp -> single relation pair (is_single :bool, relation_name :str)

model.tester.get_gui_values()

returns the GUI values for iterations.

Returns

tst_total_iterations -> number of total tests to be performed

tst_current_iteration -> current test being calculated.

tst_total_iter_steps -> total steps for current test.

tst_current_iter_steps -> current step for current test.

tst_current_progress_text -> brief information for current tesgin episode.

and the main method which starts the workflow.

model.tester.main(from_file: bool, gui_connector: Optional[TesterGUIconnector] = None)

Entry function for the tester module.

Parameters

  • from_file – Indicates if the tester module is being run with or without GUI capabilities. (with GUI if value is False)

  • gui_connector – a gui connector instance to use if needed.
